text: bulsinhan jadeul-eun jasindeul-i gyeolko buhwalhaji anh-eul geos-ilaneun heosdoen hwagsin-eul gajideola. geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘geuleohji anhnola. naui junimkke maengseko, jinsillo geudaedeul-eun buhwalhal geos-imyeo geuleon hu geudaedeul-i haenghadeon il-eul tongbo bad-eul geos-ini geugeos-eun hananim-ege swiun il-ila’
